title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste dosto! Aaj main aap sabse apni kala yatra ke baare mein baat karna chahti hoon.

Anushka: Bachpan mein, mujhe rangon se khelna bahut pasand tha. Har deewar, har kagaz meri canvas thi!

Anushka: School mein, jab sab log doctors aur engineers ban'na chahte the, mujhe bas painting karni thi.

Anushka: Pariwar ne kaha, "Yeh shauk hai, career nahi." Lekin dil ne kaha, "Yahi toh zindagi hai."

Anushka: Phir maine socha, 'Kya farak padta hai?' Maine apni suni. Arts school join kiya, ghar walon se chupa ke.

Anushka: Woh mushkil tha, par har brushstroke mein sukoon milta tha. Raatein jaag kar paintings banati thi.

Anushka: Ek local gallery mein, meri painting bik gayi! Woh ek ajeeb si khushi thi, jaise sapna sach ho gaya.

Anushka: Aaj, main ek artist hoon. Shayad mashhoor nahi, par khush hoon.

Anushka: Meri kala yatra abhi shuru hui hai. Aur main excited hoon ki aage kya hoga. Shukriya!
